Articles.Content: Okay, so I have three parts packs installed - C7\'s, SIDR, and now the Payload Fairings from Assorted Hardware. I also have a single extra parachute installed, one of Red Dawn\'s Soviet parachutes. But right after I install the Payload Fairings, and try to boot up KSP... it won\'t load. It gets to the smooth, hitchless 'Loading' screen. I know the fix is to uninstall and reinstall, but is there another way around it?

The more parts you have the longer the load time.

Some pars have a lot more polys then other and add that much more. Some parts might not be 0.11.0 compatible.

Press Alt then F2 to open up the debug console if it starts loading smoothly. Check what it says, it\'s probably because one of the C7 winglets or flaps aren\'t compatible if you still have 10.0... Or something else, just check the debug console when it is loading.
